channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump planning to visit Iowa State Fairgrounds this summer
item.description: President Trump plans to go the Iowa State Fairgrounds this summer, according to sources familiar with the plan.
